content:
I have made for you a song,
And it may be right or wrong,
But only you can tell me if it’s true;
I have tried for to explain
Both your pleasure and your pain,
And, Thomas, here’s my best respects to you! 
O there’ll surely come a day
When they’ll give you all your pay,
And treat you as a Christian ought to do;
So, until that day comes round,
Heaven keep you safe and sound,
And, Thomas, here’s my best respects to you!
cleaned: i made you a song and it may be right or wrong but only you can tell me if it’s true i tried to explain both your pleasure and your pain and thomas here’s my best respects you o there’ll surely come a day when they’ll give you all your pay and treat you as a christian ought do so that day comes round heaven keep you safe and sound and thomas here’s my best respects you
